ISSUE.TITLE: Bug: swagger API doc
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Node: **v12.22.6** Arch: **arm** Docker: **true** Database: **mysql2** ProjectOnRootDB: **true** RootDB: **mysql2** PackageVersion: **0.83.8** Project was created by clicking : **New Project** OS on which NocoDB is running : **aarch64 GNU/Linux** **Steps To Reproduce** 1. Create a table with some column 2. Go to the `Swagger API Doc` from the upper right button also used for logout 3. Click on an API (exemple: `/nc/orsay_megy/api/v1/Orsay/{OrsayId}`) 4. Both the clicked API and its bulk version are expanded (in my example `/nc/orsay_megy/api/v1/Orsay/bulk`) **Expected behavior** Only the clicked API should expand/collapse.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: refactor: remove prefix from table name(meta sync) Signed-off-by: Pranav C <pranavxc@gmail.com>

COMMIT.MESSAGE: fix: provide unique operation id in swagger json re #897 Signed-off-by: Pranav C <pranavxc@gmail.com>
